Title: Karthikeya Rao| Personal Webpage
Name: Karthikeya Rao
Description: I would describe myself as someone who is Passionate, Highly-motivated, and I particularly enjoy working as a part of a team.
I grab every chance I get to travel, learn and create.
I am confident in my abilities to produce and while I prepare for the worst, I do the work necessary to tilt the odds that the best will happen.
AboutContent: I’m a Electronics & Communication major by day, a Badminton player by evening, a functional wantrepreneur by midnight and a hustler always.
If you can’t find me, it’s because I’m already cycling, off to a hike, or studying for an exam
I am passionate about Space Technology and Human Psychology (though, never studied them formally!!). A die-hard fan of A.P.J.Abdul Kalam
I love the way the concept of "work" has evolved over the past decades, and hence would love to travel and work together whenever I can.
WorkContent: I am currently looking for an Amazing Platform to showcase my skills.
ResumeStartLine: I am always open to collaborations with impactful work. Feel free to reach out if you want to work together :)
